description: This Dart widget wraps a child widget with swipe gesture detection, translating swipe gestures into move commands for a 2048 game via the GameProvider.

classes.name: GestureBoardContainer
classes.description: A stateless widget that detects swipe gestures to control game moves in a 2048 game.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, wrapping the child widget with SwipeDetector to handle swipe gestures and invoke corresponding game movement methods.
